blogPost.excerpt: With WhatsApp Actions, it is now possible to send messages to your contacts on WhatsApp right from your Hubspot workflows.
blogPost.body: With WhatsApp Actions, it is now possible to send messages to your contacts on WhatsApp right from your Hubspot workflows.
blogPost.title: WhatsApp Actions for HubSpot - Send WhatsApp messages from HubSpot workflows
blogPost.author: Mayur Morè

localize.description: 有了 WhatsApp Actions，现在可以直接从 Hubspot 工作流向 WhatsApp 上的联系人发送消息。
有了 WhatsApp Actions，現在可以直接從 Hubspot 工作流向 WhatsApp 上的聯繫人發送消息。

previous.excerpt: Spend less time worrying about QA, PR reviews and API pipelines with Inso, the Insomnia CLI that integrates directly with your CI/CD pipeline with ease.
previous.title: Insomnia CLI - Speed up API CI/CD pipeline development

localize.description: 使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接与您的CI/CD流水线轻松集成，减少对QA、PR审查和API流水线的担忧。
使用Inso，Insomnia CLI可直接與您的CI/CD流水線輕鬆集成，減少對QA、PR審查和API流水線的擔憂。
